summary: Completed testing of two bug fixes: 1) VS layout centering between team names, 2) Favorites functionality with valid team IDs. Both fixes verified as working correctly through backend API tests and frontend UI automation.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/football/matches returns team objects with integer 'id' fields (homeTeam.id=4265, awayTeam.id=1770)
Backend: Full favorites workflow (Register → Add Liverpool FC → Get → Remove) completed successfully
Frontend: VS label is centered between teams using 'justify-center' class for NOT_STARTED matches
Frontend: VS label appears only for NOT_STARTED matches, not LIVE/FINISHED matches
Frontend: Live matches display scores with match minutes correctly (90+', 1-0)
Frontend: Heart icons have valid team IDs in data-testid (fav-heart-4265, fav-heart-1770)
Frontend: Favorites functionality works with toast notification 'Added to favorites'
Frontend: Mobile layout (390px) displays matches properly
success_percentage: backend: 80% (20/25 tests passed, 5 auth-related failures expected), frontend: 100% (all layout and integration tests passed)
